snippet.title: Beauty is a powerful force that moves us - L’Oréal
snippet.description:
It’s a quest, it’s a powerful force, and it gives us confidence in who we are, in who we want to be… 😊Yes, beauty is more than just looking good! At L’Oréal, we create the beauty that moves the world by empowering women 💪, celebrating diversity, shaping the future of beauty through science & innovation 🔬 while maintaining the protection of our planet. 🌍 Because in the end, our goal remains the same: offer you the best of beauty! Describe beauty in one word. #beautythatmoves 

► For more videos, subscribe to our channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgmv...

► Follow us for more on beauty tech, science of beauty, beauty expertise, and career tips. 
● L'Oréal Group website http://www.loreal.com/​ and https://careers.loreal.com​
● Facebook https://www.facebook.com/lorealgroupe
● Twitter https://twitter.com/lorealgroupe
● Instagram https://www.instagram.com/lorealgroupe/
● TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@lorealgroupe
● LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/1662

US/GLOBAL
